pageDescription: Manage the default rich text editor and its contextual presets.

alerts.instanceContextDesc: This is a global setting. Return to the Master context to edit.
alerts.permissionDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to edit this setting.
alerts.noEditorDesc: No editor module is active/imported. Go to "Manage Modules" and check your settings.

form.defaultEditorDesc: The selected editor will be used wherever a rich text field is needed.

presetsTab.description: This list shows all places in the application that use the rich text editor component. You can create a default content preset for each one.
presetsTab.noEditorSelectedDesc: You must select and save a default editor in the "Configuration" tab to manage presets.

toasts.saveSuccessDesc: The system's default text editor has been updated.
